ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes or concepts that identify Pipe Tobacco as a tobacco smoking substance.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment, Performed for "Tobacco product" as an attribute of result. The intent of this data element is to identify pipe tobacco as a tobacco product.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT codes identifying pipe tobacco as a tobacco smoking substance or product.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to tobacco products other than pipe tobacco. Users of non-tobacco products (e.g. e-cigarettes).)
